definition: East China Normal University/abbr. for 華東師範大學|华东师范大学[Hua2 dong1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: What are the characteristics of No. 2 High School of E. C. N. U?
sentences.chinese: 華師大二附中的辦學特色在哪裏？

sentences.english: I have lived in Cixi since I graduated from ECNU.
sentences.chinese: 自從華師大畢業後，我一直住在慈溪。
